name: pmp-js
description: Compile only the pmp-library in Js, not the apps

scripts.compile-dev: npm run compile-lib && emcc -I ./external/eigen/ -I ./src -s WASM=1 --bind src/pmp/bindings.cxx ./build/libpmp.a -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=0 -s ASSERTIONS=0 -O0 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=0 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -o ../js/pmp.js -s MODULARIZE=1 && python rename.py
scripts.compile-prod: npm run compile-lib && emcc -I ./external/eigen/ -I ./src -s WASM=1 --bind src/pmp/bindings.cxx ./build/libpmp.a -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=0 -s ASSERTIONS=0 -O3 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=0 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -o ../js/pmp.js -s MODULARIZE=1 && python rename.py
scripts.doc: typedoc documentation --excludePrivate --disableSources -name 'PMP C++ library in JavaScript' --out ../docs --includeVersion --hideGenerator
